snippet: The I.O.C. said there were 12 bobsled and luge tracks that could host the 2018 Winter Olympics if the sliding site was moved out of South Korea.
abstract: International Olympic Committee has found 12 luge and bobsled tracks around world that could host events for 2018 Winter Olympics if sliding site is relocated from South Korea.
lead_paragraph: The I.O.C. said there were 12 bobsled and luge tracks that could host the 2018 Winter Olympics if the sliding site was moved out of South Korea.

headline.main: I.O.C. Eyes Change of Venue for Bobsled and Luge in 2018
